attributes.action: Stop Cfbt throwing our children out of their School
attributes.additional_details: Cfbt and Langley Hall Free school are throwing out in July 120 primary aged children from their already occupied school building. Cfbt having already surrendered an early Ten year lease of the building to an up and running free school 0.6 from our school that wants to expand into our building. Our children in year 5 are due to sit the 11 plus in september and have nowhere to sit it now.
